EmailTemplate.description: Thank you email after phone screen interview
EmailTemplate.name: Thank You After Phone Screen
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You - {!Opportunity.Name} Phone Screen
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today about the {!Opportunity.Name} position at {!Opportunity.Account.Name}.
I enjoyed learning more about the role and your team's initiatives. Our conversation reinforced my enthusiasm for this opportunity and my confidence that my Salesforce expertise would be a strong asset to your organization.
I'm very excited about the possibility of contributing to your team and look forward to the next steps in the process.
Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need any additional information.
Thank you again for your time and consideration.
Best regards, Abby Luggery {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
